response.original_title: Elfogyni az ölelésben - Ady Endre szerelmei
response.overview: The film-play evokes perhaps the most loving period of the aging Endre Ady's (1877-1919) life, in which we can learn more about the Hungarian poetic giant in the intimate emotional web of his legendary loves.
response.title: Elfogyni az ölelésben - Ady Endre szerelmei
